title: Recall Notification Report
summary: Editor's Note (Jan. 4, 2011): FSIS is re-issuing Recall Release FSIS-RC-001-2011, to clarify the reason for the recall was mislabeling since monosodium glutamate (MSG) was not declared on the label. Monosodium glutamate (MSG) is not classified as an allergen, but can cause a brief reaction...
impacted_products: 6-lb. cases of "CRAVE PIES CHICKEN MUSHROOM PIE," with each case containing 12 individual packages
